channel.title: Help with server commands, please
channel.description: I have just recently created a 508 server off this site and I wanted to know if anyone could send me a list of commands (item pickup). I have searched in Google but I can't find how to use them, only how to add them to my server. On my older server which is like a RSC server all i had to type was f.e. ::pickup 1077 0001 (Bandos Tassets) and viola. Now I don't know what how to use them. My characters rights is set to 2... I think that is right? And if you could email it to me that would be great, I'm not sure if posting my email address is against the rules, it shouldn't be. tohume@hotmail.com Sp yeah please help me, any help would be appreciated. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 12, 2009, 06:47:01 am[/size][hr]Sorry for double post, but just needed to say that i figured out how to spawn items but i want to know how to get grand exchange working. i found one tut. but it only said how to make F2P and P2P (one for each world) which means you cant get mem items to show on one world and cant get free to play items to show on the other well yeah please help if you can thanks. and also how people can join my server, like do they just download the same client as me then enter my IP when they log in? thanks

item.title: Help with server commands, please
item.dc:creator: @Swinescape Swinescape
item.description:
@Swinescape wrote:

Set them to 3 maybe

item.title: Help with server commands, please
item.dc:creator: @mrt0147485 mrt0147485
item.description:
@mrt0147485 wrote:

I have just recently created a 508 server off this site and I wanted to know if anyone could send me a list of commands (item pickup). I have searched in Google but I can’t find how to use them, only how to add them to my server. On my older server which is like a RSC server all i had to type was f.e. ::pickup 1077 0001 (Bandos Tassets) and viola. Now I don’t know what how to use them. My characters rights is set to 2… I think that is right?
And if you could email it to me that would be great, I’m not sure if posting my email address is against the rules, it shouldn’t be.
tohume@hotmail.com
Sp yeah please help me, any help would be appreciated.

well yeah please help if you can thanks. and also how people can join my server, like do they just download the same client as me then enter my IP when they log in? thanks
